participants.name: Donnelly West
participants.description: Graduate Research Assistant at UC Davis
participants.url: Former Treasurer at Flagstaff Community Supported Agriculture

messages.message:
Brian
I would love to work with you geniuses.  Can you give me a referral?
for which position? you know i'm still at UC Davis for this year?

Brian
Yes
are you moving to CA

Brian
I am if you find me a job!

(ps i recommend mot-davis; this city sucks)
O_o
o_O what type of work do you want?
(i thought you really liked your job  back in phx, but we haven't talked in 2 million years x_x )

Brian
I have an interview at PNNL.  Can you apply there?  I need your brains.  You are my magnate and a genius to me.
Technology supplier for DARPA
https://www.pnnl.gov/
Pacific Northwest National Laboratory
The Pacific Northwest National Laboratory in Richland Washington is a U.S. Department of Energy (DOE) government research laboratory. The Laboratory focuses on research and development related to waste management, environmental restoration, global environmental change, energy and national security.
pnnl.gov
They invent solutions before the rest of the world realizes there is a problem.

neat!
I was actually thinking of applying to this: https://www.llnl.gov/
same basic thing

Brian
Yeah, that would be a good stepping stone, maybe even for me too.  But I think you are smarter.  I am seeing signs.
lol - thanks

Brian
Did you want to know signs?

sure
(also, I don't know if I'd like living in WA.. I might need more sunshine than that)

Brian
PNNL is similar to desert, slightly more rain and snow than Arizona, about 20 degrees cooler.  Definitely not the typical Seattle rain all the time.  Richard Lester worked for LLNL and he is still wasting time commenting on politics.  This is a sign to me that things are stale.  Politics is a huge waste of time.  Everything is a waste of time.  Need more information on that?

oh, that does sound better! even here, there's a 'gray' winter and I get a little less enthusiastic about life
I'm a tropical kid

Brian
Me too. Work there with me and we can go on vacation together.

politics are disappointing - we do not seem to inspire the best of the population to join politics 
that would be cool!
I'll browse their jobs 
I won't be 'done' until 2017, though
(unless they want to hire me with a master's instead lol)

Brian
I can explain politics later.  I would love your help with this.  There is so much I have to say and so little time.  You are smart enough.  Thank you for replying.  How much time do you have right now?
Masters is good enough.
Education is a waste of time.
lol

Brian
Just work with smarter people than yourself and you will transcend college.
https://www.reddit.com/r/iama
I Am A, where the mundane becomes fascinating and the outrageous suddenly seems normal. â€¢ /r/IAmA
reddit: the front page of the internet
reddit.com
well, it depends on your field - sometimes you need the piece of paper to get near the smart folks

Brian
Oh man, you have no idea how much I respect you right now.
thanks

Brian
Think about these two extremes.  God, and Work.  Most prefer there is no connection.  I made the connection.  I am confronting atheists to learn how to explain what God teaches us in a work friendly way without the use of that word.
This level of understanding can solve every world problem in this lifetime.
that is powerful

Brian
I can't turn it off.  I just need connections to intelligence.  I love you.  More than I could explain.
Thanks Brian  You're important to me too!

Brian
Define equanimity:
I appreciate that 
Most of us are geniuses we just haven't realized it yet.
people have so much potential

Brian
What is your ultimate goal in life?
try to make the world a bit better than it was when i started
Brian
I plant a lot of native plants around the places i live
Brian
how about you?
Brian

Brian
Ask as many questions as possible and transcendence.
asking questions is good

Brian
https://www.technologyreview.com/s/527561/military-funds-brain-computer-interfaces-to-control-feelings/
Military Seeks Psychiatric Brain Stimulators
A $70 million program will try to develop brain implants able to regulate emotions in the mentally ill.
technologyreview.com
How do you give AI morals?
good question

Brian
I already know the answer, I just wanted to know what you think?
all the scifi indicates no matter what we do, it'll backfire

Brian
Excellent point.  That is a system controlled my politics, money, and violence.  Ignore those issues on Facebook and your brain has time for more important things like this.

I waste a lot of time 
but it lets my brain work on problems in the background

Brian
I agree 100%.  Multitasking and interleaving is viewed as bad things, but it actually makes you faster if you practice.
Everything is a distraction from your ultimate goal, all distractions have a priority.
We should play a game.  Every 1 sentence is in the form of a question.  How much time do you have?

i actually need to get going - i have a meeting in like 10 mins
it was good chatting with you!!

Brian
Thank you!

Brian
One more reason I came up with.  Batelle Memorial Institute.  PNNL is the only lab that I have seen that doesn't have weapons on their front page.
In fact, the wikipedia page doesn't even mention weapons except the first paragraph to explain "nonproliferation of nuclear weapons"
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pacific_Northwest_National_Laboratory
The singularity is nigh, if I was a super intelligent computer trying to decide between wrong and right, we get skynet, or pnnl.  Two opposite ends of the spectrum in my honest opinion.
worth considering

Brian
The only reason I am using Facebook is because I see people I love wasting time arguing.  I am here to save you with smiles
Haha - a truly worthwhile goal! I like staying in touch with folks without needing to update addresses and such

Brian
Got turned down for PNNL, didn't make the cut.
there's always the next round!

Brian
Unlikely for me. Turns out I am bi-polar. Reading online ADD makes it really hard to get a job. But at least I have made other people I care about aware of the opportunity there. Better to live for others. Good luck, the best time to apply is when you are currently happily employed.
Getting a job is a pain.
